channel.title: Need help with p ring
channel.description: do anybody now how i add a p ring ?

item.title: Need help with p ring
item.dc:creator: @grimreaper61 grimreaper61
item.description:
@grimreaper61 wrote:

anything can be a “perfect” item. All you have to do is pick the item you want then go into item.cfg and edit the stats for it. The pring on my server has 100k in every stat so not only can i 1 hit anyone, but i also cannot be touched. IT takes care of all the needs whether it be no hits while in wild moderating or k0ing annoying players
To do this use this formatitem = XXXX(tab)item name(tab)examine info(tab)Prices(tab)prices(tab)prices(tab)100000(tab)100000(tab)100000(tab)100000(tab)100000(tab)100000(tab)100000(tab)100000(tab)100000(tab)100000(tab)100000(tab)0
The last one is the prayer bonuse, i advise leaving that one at 0 since on some sources if it goes above a certain number it atually drains prayer

Read full topic
